com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv

Class SCRegexValidationRule<T extends SCValidationContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.SCBaseValidationRule<T>
      • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.SCRegexValidationRule<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISCValidationRule

    public class SCRegexValidationRule<T extends SCValidationContext>
extends SCBaseValidationRule<T>
    This class provides an implementation of ISCValidationRule which validates an input based on defined black-list and white-list regular expressions. asmishra T the type of validation context to be fetched by SCBaseValidationRule.getValidationContext() method.
